title: WHY WON'T THEY SHOW UP?
body: Well i was talking to my friend and he decided to spam which was really lagging my computer so i blocked him for a while then after i got back the was somehow offline and for the next couple days he was still offline which was really weird. He usually is on. So the next day i looked and he was gone. So tried to refriend him again and it said if the user accepts you will see him online. And the moment i sent it his name popped up again. But after i closed the browser his name dissapeared again. I refriended him a couple of times and it kept happening. Please help. I really like to talk to him again. He really was a good friend. (His username was Dayst and his club was Woord.)

replies.body:
This may be caused by a corrupted summoner properties file. Clearing the file may resolve the problem you are experiencing. This file stores all of your pvp.net preferences and if it's corrupt, it can cause a lot of issues with chat and friends.

First, log in to the client, then minimize it and find your Summoner's Properties file here:

> C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\<Version Number>\deploy\preferences\<Summoner Name>.properties

**Delete** the file, then close out the client and log back in. Add your friend again and see if this resolved the issue.
